subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant scored 24 points to lead the Lakers to a 98-80 victory over the Hornets, and Joe Johnson had 23 points as the Hawks ousted the Magic.
snippet: Kobe Bryant scored 24 points to lead the Lakers to a 98-80 victory over the Hornets, and Joe Johnson had 23 points as the Hawks ousted the Magic.
